info.name: Post (table)
info.description: For all query related to Table Post

item.name: POST

request.description:
Create post with watch party

Required Input field:

- uid
- movie_id
- content
    

Optional input field:

- newWatchParty: bool. Indicating if this post is creating a new WatchParty
    - Default to False
    - If true, following fields are required:
        - date: date of the watch party
        - time: time of the day of the watch party
        - platform: string for the holding platform

Output:

- created: boolean
- pid: the created pid

item.description: For all query related to post (create) in this table

request.description:
Get all posts by this user, with newest post on the top

Required Input field:

- uid: user's id
    

Output:

- list of post with attribute if any

request.description:
Retrieve all posts visible to this user (user’s own post and his followers)

Required input:

- uid: user's id
    

Output:

- list of post with attribute if any
